channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Unpermitted roadworks problem, 19th November
item.description:
Customer reports leftover barriers/sandbags have been left leaning against the PGR on the island. Asking if they can be removed as they keep blowing over in the wind.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 19th November
item.description:
NWD Give and take with temporary footway closure please lift and relay x1 450x450x30mm NUMBER 1 (FW Rocking/Unstable Slab)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 19th November
item.description:
Poorly tree, dead branched keep falling on the footway, danger to pedestrians.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Road Markings problem, 19th November
item.description:
